description: This week on NK, two newcomers battle for sexual dominance. Derek Reynolds is a powerful specimen. His physique alone is enough to intimidate even the most confident of competitors. But, as we have proven here at NK time and again, these muscle studs have a tendency to lose their wind too easily. Will Derek prove the exception to the rule or will he simply run out of steam? His opponent, Troy Daniels, is hoping for the latter. His toned swimmer's build is perfect for the grueling eight-minute rounds. He hopes to capitalize on his opponent's weakness so that he can make Derek worship his beautiful uncut cock. It's a battle of size versus stamina this week in a loser-gets-fucked fight for victory.
title: Derek Reynolds vs. Troy Daniels The Oil Match
